mapper.select: SELECT code, series_code, user_code, title, content, confirm_content, thumbnail_image, views, price, is_paid, is_adult, is_public, is_deleted, create_date, update_date FROM post WHERE code=#{code} AND is_deleted='Y';

mapper.update: UPDATE post SET series_code=#{seriesCode}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, thumbnail_image=#{thumbnailImage}, price=#{price}, is_paid=#{isPaid}, is_adult=#{isAdult}, is_public=#{isPublic} WHERE code=#{code} AND is_deleted='Y';
